title: Khawiah pawh Lal Isua nen chuan awm ila
lyrics:
Khawiah pawh Lal Isua nen chuan awm ila,
He khawvela min hruaina apiangah chuan;
Amah lovin a chuai ang lawmna ber pawh,
Isua nen chuan eng mah reng ka hlau lo vang.

Khawiah pawh hlauhna reng ka hre ngai lo vang,
Isua nen chuan him takin ka kal thei ang.

Khawiah pawh Lal Isua nen chuan awm ila,
Amah ka Lal a ni, thian dang ka ngai lo'ng;
Lungngaihna kawngah pawh min hruai mah sela,
Isua nen chuan lam takin ka kal zel ang.

Hrehawm taka thimin min rawn vel pawhin,
Isua nen chuan muang takin ka chhing thei ang;
Harh hunah pawh ka bo tawh lo'ng tih hriain,
Isua nen chuan in nuam tak a chang zel ang.
